Package com.house.service.faq

Class FAQServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.house.service.faq.FAQServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
FAQService
@Service public class FAQServiceImpl extends Object implements FAQService
Service layer that implement FAQ Service interface The layer between controller and dao layers for checking correctness of a data
